aboutMe.subTitle: introduccion
aboutMe.description:
Full Stack Developer specialized in React, Node.js, and Express, passionate about building intuitive, efficient, and high-quality web applications.

 I excel at learning quickly, adapting to new challenges, and turning ideas into functional solutions.

 I enjoy collaborating on innovative projects that create real impact.

experience.mainTitle: What I’ve worked on so far
experience.subTitle: Work Experience

cargologik.description:
At Cargologik, I worked as a Backend Developer, designing and implementing scalable and secure systems using Node.js, MongoDB, and Google Cloud.

I collaborated closely with product and frontend teams to develop REST APIs and cloud functions that optimized logistics processes.

I was also responsible for code reviews, proposing technical improvements, resolving production issues, and maintaining best practices for security and performance.

Additionally, I actively contributed to the evolution of the architecture, always aiming for efficient and sustainable solutions.

freelance.description:
I have worked as a freelance developer, building custom web solutions for various clients, combining modern technologies with a functional and visually appealing approach.

Responsibilities and Achievements:
• Developed full web applications using React, Node.js, Express, and Tailwind CSS.
• Created websites and landing pages using frameworks like Vite and Astro JS.
• Configured and deployed WordPress websites.
• Integrated databases such as MongoDB, MySQL, and PostgreSQL.
• Participated in custom hardware projects (Arduino, Raspberry Pi).
• Managed projects from design to final deployment.

whynot.description:
I participated in the end-to-end development of web applications, using modern technologies and a user experience–focused approach. I worked remotely with an international team, contributing to both the frontend and backend of the projects.

Responsibilities and Achievements:
• Implemented modern and responsive interfaces using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
• Developed REST APIs with Node.js and Express.
• Managed data using Prisma as the ORM.
• Maintained the full data flow between client and server.
• Actively collaborated in agile development cycles.

noCountry.description:
I participated as a backend developer in a remote collaborative environment, contributing to multiple projects through the creation and documentation of APIs. The role focused on modern technologies and agile methodologies such as Scrum.

Responsibilities and Achievements:
• Developed and maintained REST APIs using Node.js and Express.js.
• Designed relational database models with PostgreSQL and Sequelize.
• Utilized MongoDB for non-relational data structures.
• Managed version control and team collaboration using Git and GitHub.
• Worked in an agile environment under Scrum methodology, with iterative deliveries and team meetings.

alkemy.description:
I participated in an intensive full-stack development project, creating a virtual wallet using modern technologies such as JavaScript, Node.js, Express, MySQL, Vite, and React. The program included technical training, agile methodologies (Scrum), and soft skills development.

Responsibilities and Achievements:
• Developed backend functionalities with Node.js, Express, and Sequelize.
• Built the frontend using React, Redux, and Tailwind CSS.
• Integrated a relational database with MySQL.
• Practiced agile methodologies in a remote collaborative environment.
• Improved communication and teamwork skills.

madness.description:
I founded Madness Electronics, an e-commerce store specialized in electronic components and DIY projects. I managed the design, development, and maintenance of the website using WordPress and WooCommerce, while also creating educational and functional projects with Arduino and Raspberry Pi. Additionally, I produced technical content, including tutorials and articles on electronics, programming, and embedded systems.

Key Responsibilities & Achievements:
• Designed, launched, and managed a full e-commerce platform from scratch.
• Developed and deployed DIY and IoT projects with microcontrollers and development boards.
• Created technical educational content, including tutorials and step-by-step guides.
• Combined web development, hardware prototyping, and content creation to grow a tech-focused brand.

tech.title: Languages, frameworks, and technologies
tech.subtitle: Tech Stack
tech.rarelyUsed: Technologies I know but rarely use:

projects.title: Some of my work
projects.subtitle: Projects
projects.description: These are some of the projects I've worked on that showcase my skills and knowledge. Each project includes a short description, tags for the technologies used, and links to the corresponding repositories and demos.
projects.more: If you want to see more of my code, feel free to visit my

iphone.description: Clone of the iPhone landing page, built using Vite as the framework, GSAP for modern and smooth animations, and Tailwind CSS for styling.

chatbot.description: This chatbot uses the Gemini API, Google's artificial intelligence. Users can create an account, enter the chat, and interact with it.

saludarte.description: Healthcare website for the company Saludarte, built using Astro.js, Tailwind CSS, and Bun as the runtime environment.

lilaStore.description: E-commerce specialized in beauty products. Developed using WordPress and WooCommerce.

shoesStore.description: Full Stack e-commerce platform specialized in sports shoes, allowing customers to place orders and make purchases directly from the website. It also includes an admin dashboard.

autosUsados.description: Full Stack Marketplace for buying and selling used cars, with an internal messaging system between users.

wallet.description: Virtual wallet built with a team of Full Stack developers as part of the emulation and skill-up program at Alkemy.

barber.description: Platform for the complete management of a barbershop. Clients can choose a barber, book appointments, and select services. The admin can manage services, pricing, and payments to barbers.

expenseTracker.description: Personal finance management app. Users can view statistics and get a clear summary of their income and expenses.

classRoom.description: App to create virtual classrooms where students can watch pre-recorded lessons and interact with teachers and classmates through real-time chat.
